title: How to Burn More Than Once to DVD R

steps.headline: Insert a blank DVD-R, DVD+R or CD-R into your CD-Drive.
Install Nero on your computer or any other CD/DVD burning software.
Select the files to be written on the DVD and then click next, after you will be asked if you want to burn the DVD in multi session or not.
Once the burning process is complete, insert the DVD again into your driver and this time you can write it in usual manner.

tyn: Computer with disk burning capabilities (built-in disk drive, or an external drive)
text: Insert a blank DVD-R, DVD+R or CD-R into your CD-Drive.  Install Nero on your computer or any other CD/DVD burning software.  Select the files to be written on the DVD and then click next, after you will be asked if you want to burn the DVD in multi session or not.  Select "burn with multi session".  Once the burning process is complete, insert the DVD again into your driver and this time you can write it in usual manner.  Finished.
sentences: Insert a blank DVD-R, DVD+R or CD-R into your CD-Drive.
Install Nero on your computer or any other CD/DVD burning software.
Select the files to be written on the DVD and then click next, after you will be asked if you want to burn the DVD in multi session or not.
Once the burning process is complete, insert the DVD again into your driver and this time you can write it in usual manner.
